title: Patching Error For OCE On Mac
body:
I have no problems with patching then getting to the login in client on NA when when I switch over to OCE the patcher client goes through thousand of files then stops then shows an error happened then goes to 99% and stops and looks at one file. Before the new patch i had no problems but ever since yesterday the client is playing up and i can't even get the the login in screen. Ive tried deleting the files in the Lol application, but everything I try from support doesn't work. I even tried to repair the game but it shows the same error.

Please does anyone have any advice?

replies.body: I fixed it by reinstalling, but it took a while to download league again. :D
What error message are you getting?
Have you tried switching to NA again, and then back to OCE? Could be that it just got the wrong manifest file.
